posts.title: A Night on the Town
posts.author: Rachel Hantz
posts.description: A night on the town doesn't have to be just for humans.
posts.content:
Sammy's Night on the Town

Sammy goes out on the town with style.  She's got her little boots on and is ready to party!

Watch her walk with her long tabby like hair and she sways her tail.



She strolls around with her meow heard from all around the town.
